page.title: 02Stoke Park Survey -results 1
page.content:
RECREATION -family leisure activities Spectator sports 35% Fishing 29% Participatory sports 53% Discos 33% Indoor games 34% Reading 64% Gardening 61% Dancing 21%
CLUBS -members of families belong to: Indoor sports 38% Charity 11% Outdoor sports 34% Social 44% Women's Institute 02% Political 6% Religious 11%
ENTERTAINMENT -monthly use by members of family (number of people-visits): Pubs and Clubs 429 Cinema 43 Dance performances 23 Theatre 23 Concerts 13 Opera 0
MEDIA -167 household made use of: Televisions 176 Newspapers 163 Video Recorder 100 Radio 177
